ItemConsumable.name: Sublime
ItemConsumable.description: This vial of liquid seethes with potential. It says it's a biological refactoring agent that will specialize your body as a powerful eating machine to better subsist on living creatures you consume. "Sublime elevation can only be attained through predatory dominance," it claims.
ItemConsumable.effectmodifier: You can feel the acidic elixir burn through your body, rewriting your digestive and other metabolic processes. Your karma score is now VALUE and you could really go for a girl right now.
